name: retrosync
description: Cloud sync service for retro gaming save files

scripts.dashboard:db:push: cd dashboard && npx prisma db push
scripts.dashboard:db:migrate: cd dashboard && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.client:build:deploy: npm run client:build && npm run client:deploy
scripts.client:build:deploy:muos: npm run client:build && npm run client:deploy:muos
scripts.build: npm run dashboard:build && npm run client:build
scripts.deploy: npm run client:build && npm run client:deploy
scripts.deploy:vercel: vercel link --yes --project retrosync 2>/dev/null || true && node scripts/vercel-env.mjs && vercel --prod

author: RetroSync Team
